snippet: Emoji, which in Japan is as common as teen girl pop ensembles, can be had on your iPhone just by changing your keyboard settings.
abstract: Emoji, which in Japan is as common as teen girl pop ensembles, can be had on your iPhone just by changing your keyboard settings.
lead_paragraph: A few weeks back, a colleague, Jenna Wortham, wrote about the growing popularity of emoji, which are much more elaborate versions of emoticons.

headline.main: Making Texts More Graphic With Emoji
